document.heading: Towing Regulation and Enforcement Authority Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-279, the “Towing Regulation and Enforcement Authority Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-364, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 7, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 29, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-670 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-279 became effective on April 5, 2005.
